title.rendered: Lucknow Super Giants(LSG) vs Gujarat, Indian T20 League 2022: Fantasy Cricket Tips for Today’s Match

content.rendered:
Time: 28 Mar, 7.30 PM, IST

Venue: Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai

Wankhede Stadium Pitch Report

As we saw in the opening game, pace bowlers will get decent bounce and carry on the Wankhede wicket. Also, the pitch is unlikely to lose its consistency as the game progresses.

Probable Lucknow Super Giants & Gujarat Teams

Probable XI for Lucknow Super Giants(LSG): KL Rahul (c & wk), Manan Vohra, Manish Pandey, Evin Lewis, Deepak Hooda, Krunal Pandya, Avesh Khan, Ravi Bishnoi, Dushmantha Chameera, K Gowtham, Andrew Tye

Jason Holder, Marcus Stoinis, and Kyle Mayers won’t be available for this game as they are busy with international duties.

Probable XI for Gujarat: Matthew Wade (wk), Shubhnam Gill, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Abhinav Manohar, Abhinav Sadarangani, Vijay Shankar, Hardik Pandya (c), Rahul Tewatia, Rashid Khan, Mohammad Shami, Lockie Ferguson

Fantasy Team for Today’s Gujarat Vs Lucknow Super Giants Match

We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Power Players from Lucknow SuperGiants & Gujarat Teams

All eyes will be on Lucknow’s skipper KL Rahul. He loves playing in the cash-rich league and has consistently been amongst the runs in the last two editions. In 2021, he finished as the third-highest run-getter (626) at 62.60, including 6 half-centuries.

Rashid Khan is arguably the best spinner in this format. While he plays franchise cricket across the world, his record in the Indian T20 League stands out. In 76 games, the Afghanistan leg-spinner has bagged 93 wickets at an incredible economy of 6.33.

Smart Picks from LSG & Gujarat Teams

There are no reports suggesting that Hardik Pandya might bowl his quota of four overs. That said, we know what the Indian all-rounder is capable of doing with his bat alone. Given that he will lead Gujarat, he could even promote himself up the order.

When Krunal Pandya played for Mumbai, he regularly chipped in with both bat and ball, which also helped fantasy players. More of the same will be expected from the all-rounder.

Ravi Bishnoi shot to fame in this tournament by winning the Emerging Player award in 2020. He will lead the spin attack for Lucknow going forward. He has already taken 24 wickets with his wily wrist-spin.

The onus of controlling runs and picking wickets at the death will be on Avesh Khan. Last year, he ended the tournament as the second-highest wicket-taker (24 in 16 games). 

See the ball, hit the ball: that’s the mantra Evin Lewis believes in while batting. If the southpaw gets going in the powerplay, he can run away with the game.

Gujarat will pin their hopes on strike bowlers Mohammad Shami and Lockie Ferguson for early breakthroughs. While the Indian seamer picked up 19 wickets in 14 games last year, the Kiwi pacer ended up with 13 scalps in 8 matches.

Given Gujarat’s weak middle-order, Shubhman Gill will have to step up and play a responsible knock at the top. It will be interesting to see what approach the youngster adopts this season.  

Also Read:

Hyderabad vs Rajasthan, Indian T20 League 2022: Fantasy Cricket Tips

Fantasy Cricket Tips for Bangalore vs Kolkata, Indian T20 League Match

LSG Vs Gujarat Match Preview

Both teams will be playing their first-ever Indian T20 League game and would be keen on outplaying the other. While Gujarat’s bowling appears strong, the inexperienced middle-order is likely to get exposed. On the other hand, Lucknow’s squad appears more balanced and settled. 

Excited for LSG Vs Gujarat Match? Download My11Circle fantasy cricket and start playing now!
